message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate your product, $14,000 is a bit too steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $9,000 is significantly below its value.  I could meet you halfway at $11,500. This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $11,500 is still a bit high for me, but I'm willing to go up to $10,500. This is my final offer, let me know if you're interested.
